title: Time Quiz
description: Test your knowledge of telling time and calculating elapsed time

questions.question: What time is shown when the hour hand points to 3 and the minute hand points to 6?
questions.explanation: The minute hand pointing to 6 means 30 minutes. The hour hand pointing to 3 means 3 o'clock. So the time is 3:30.

questions.question: How many seconds are in 4 minutes?
questions.explanation: 60 seconds = 1 minute, so 4 minutes = 4 ร 60 = 240 seconds.

questions.question: If it's 2:45, what is the time called?
questions.explanation: 2:45 means 45 minutes after 2, which is 15 minutes before 3. This is called quarter to 3 (or quarter before 3).

questions.question: A class starts at 10:15 AM and lasts 50 minutes. What time does it end?
questions.explanation: Start at 10:15, add 50 minutes: 10:15 + 45 minutes = 11:00, plus 5 more minutes = 11:05 AM.
